summary: New Jersey is one of the 50 states of the United States of America.
full_text: Hugh Mercer  was a soldier and physician. He initially served with British forces during the Seven Years' War but later became a brigadier general in the Continental Army and a close friend to George Washington. Mercer died as a result of his wounds received at the Battle of Princeton and became a fallen hero and rallying symbol of the American Revolution.
title: Hugh Mercer
